EmailTemplate.name: Customer - Case Closed
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Case # {!Case.CaseNumber}: "{!Case.Subject}" has been solved
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Account.Name},
We are sending you this email to confirm ticket # {!Case.CaseNumber}: "{!Case.Subject}" has been resolved.
If this is not the case, or if you wish to reopen the support ticket, please contact us.
We hope you are satisfied with your service and will be more than happy to respond to any comments or concerns you may have.
Thank You, {!Organization.Name} Customer Service
